title: Authenticate for the  API — auth
code: auth(   user,   password,   domain = "https://bsky.app/",   verbose = TRUE,   token = NULL )

title: Authenticate for the  API — auth
text: user user handle (e.g, benguinaudeau.bsky.social). password app password (usually created https://bsky.app/settings/app-passwords). domain now https://bsky.app/, change future. verbose TRUE, prints success message. token (Stale) token object. Usually need use . manage tokens get stale, can use parameter request fresh token.

title: Authenticate for the  API — auth
text: requesting token, safed location returned file.path(tools::R_user_dir("atr", "cache"), Sys.getenv("BSKY_TOKEN", unset = "token.rds")). multiple tokens, can use Sys.setenv(BSKY_TOKEN = "filename.rds") save/load token different name.
